articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Former West Ham players walk off over alleged racial abuse at US tournament - The Guardian
articles.description: Former West Ham players representing the club at a seven-a-side event walked off the pitch after alleged racial abuse
articles.content:
Former West Ham players representing the club at a seven-a-side soccer tournament in North Carolina walked off the pitch after alleged racial abuse.
The alleged incident occurred against Dallas Unit… [+1830 chars]
